ygData.subject: Thanks Guys!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Everyone, I would like to thank all of you who have provided info/tips and much guidance on the game. Thanks especially to Ziltus,Flyingfox for bringing me
ygData.messageBody:
Hi Everyone,

I would like to thank all of you who have provided info/tips and much guidance on the game.
Thanks especially to Ziltus,Flyingfox for bringing me to FP and also to Sereph (and uh that Ae*** person..hehe..)for having
brought me to Oasis. It was a great place for me as i went up 2 levels from 14 to 16 pretty quickly there. Much thanks
Sereph for having helped me gain that last bubble to 16 hehe..as a yellow DW Caiman certainly helps with exp.

I got killed twice by SGs so far...one spawned on me i think and another was trained by someone running past me. Hell..
almost got killed by a Spectre once too! Lucky i Gated while pet tanked it!

On to spell research...i know it's gonna be tough road from now on having to research...but i think it's only
summoning spells right? (i hope!) I don't mean to be a smart aleck but i think lvl 16 and lvl20 pet spells can be bought
but beyond that..probably unlikely. Dunno about that though..Thanks though to FF and Sereph for having
informed me of the tough road ahead. At least i'll be mentally prepared..sigh..

Any ideas on practice points though? I've saved up about 50 practice points..not sure what to use them for right now.
Thinking of keeping them for specialization? Hmm..any comments?

I've been in Oasis for awhile..but i was wondering..which mobs there are good for looting? I need more money..i'm down
to only 45 pp now!! Getting poor again. The orcs there any good? Only found one bronze weapon on them so far..but i've been
perhaps abit cautious in my attacks as i'm still soloing.

Thanks once again and Good Hunting!

Zanderion (lvl 16 mage)
